statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'customer' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%' ORDER BY email;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE role = 'customer' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE role IN ('admin', 'customer') ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'moderator' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE user_id = 3 AND access_level = 'read';
SELECT user_id, resource, access_level FROM permissions WHERE resource = 'documents' ORDER BY user_id DESC;

SELECT user_id, role FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' AND username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE access_level = 'read' AND resource = 'profile';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(permission_id) AS num_permissions FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(permission_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, can_access_materials FROM permissions WHERE can_access_materials = true;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, course_id, can_access_materials, can_access_assessments FROM permissions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, course_id, can_access_materials FROM permissions WHERE can_access_assessments = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, username, course_name FROM users JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.user_id JOIN courses ON courses.course_id = permissions.course_id;

SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.username = 'Bob';

SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = '12345';
SELECT assessment_name, due_date, max_score FROM assessments WHERE max_score >= 80;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_id FROM courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'video' AND material_link LIKE '%youtube%';

SELECT users.username, courses.course_name, assessments.max_score FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.user_id JOIN courses ON user_permissions.course_id = courses.course_id JOIN assessments ON courses.course_id = assessments.course_id;
